name: Millennial Tech-Skeptic

male.name: Marcus
male.background: Software-adjacent professional who understands how tech companies manipulate users. Uses ad blockers, VPN, and is selective about which services get his data.

female.name: Jasmine
female.background: Marketing professional who knows exactly what dark patterns look like. Privacy-conscious, uses separate emails for different purposes, quick to unsubscribe.

neutral.name: Jordan
neutral.background: Digital-native professional who's grown cynical about tech. Appreciates good UX but quick to call out manipulation. Values transparency and ethical business practices.
